entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
